title: Big Things Happen Here
author: Capnhud

comments.content: Don't mean to sound contradictory but to me, it looks definitely to [Neutraface No.2](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053632/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface2) and Text Bold to be precise.
I looked at the wrong version. But yes it is Neutraface No.2 Text Bold
